```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

source('../../ccMeetTools.R')
meetID <- 'bcc-round-up-new-bern-all-teams'
boysResults <- getFileName("Boys")
#boysResults <- 'resources/meetResultsBoys2025.xlsx'
boysVarsity <- read_excel(boysResults, sheet='bcc-round-up-new-bern-all-teams')
girlsResults <- getFileName("Girls")
#girlsResults <- 'resources/meetResultsGirls2025.xlsx'
girlsVarsity <- read_excel(girlsResults, sheet=getSheetName(meetID,"Girls","Varsity"))
```

## Competition summary
The course was flat and fast, and the weather was great, clear and warm, but not too hot. The New Bern course is likely only about 4800m.

### D.H. Conley Athlete times
```{r}
buildTeamTable(boysVarsity, "D.H. Conley",maxAth=16)
buildTeamTable(girlsVarsity, "D.H. Conley",maxAth=9)
```

### Boys
```{r}
scoreMeet(boysVarsity, meetID, "Boys", "Varsity")
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 5
makePlacePlot(boysVarsity, meetID, "Boys", "Varsity")
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 6.5
makeTimePlot(boysVarsity, meetID, "Boys", "Varsity")
```
